text: Martin David Brasier FGS, FLS (12 April 1947 â€“ 16 December 2014) was an English palaeobiologist and astrobiologist. He was Professor of Palaeobiology at the University of Oxford and Emeritus Fellow of St Edmund Hall. Brasier died in a car accident near Burford, Oxfordshire, UK, on 16 December 2014. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Scientists from London
title: Martin Brasier
